remarks: A binary relation of the value of an operation given by the "maps to" notation.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 21-Oct-2017.)
statement:
brovex.1 $e |- O = ( x e. _V , y e. _V |-> C ) $.
brovex.2 $e |- ( ( V e. _V /\ E e. _V ) -> Rel ( V O E ) ) $.
brovex $p |- ( F ( V O E ) P -> ( ( V e. _V /\ E e. _V ) /\ ( F e. _V /\ P e. _V ) ) ) $.
$d x y $.
